original: Björkman, Liss-Eric Hugo, hov-rättsfiskal, Jönköping, f. 10/7/13 i Kalmar av järnhandl. Eric B. o. Hanna Fogelberg. G. 40 m. Inga Hedberg. Barn: Agneta f. 42, Eva 45. — Stud:-ex. i Kalmar 31, jur. kand. i Lund 36. Tingstjg. i N. Möre o. Stranda doms. 36-39, tjg. i Göta hovr. fr. 39, fiskal där 40, tf. assessor v. Norrköp. råd-husr. 41, sekr. i Bråbygdens o. Fin-spånga läns doms. 42-46, adjung. led. av Göta hovr. 46. Ordf. i Kviillinge hyresnd 42-46, ordf. i tax:nd 45.
translated: Björkman, Liss-Eric Hugo, court fiscale, Jönköping, b. July 10, 1913 in Kalmar to ironmonger Eric B. and Hanna Fogelberg. Married in 1940 to Inga Hedberg, with whom he has two children: Agneta (b. 1942) and Eva (b. 1945). He received his high school diploma in Kalmar in 1931 and completed his law degree in Lund in 1936. He served as assessor in N. Möre and Stranda district courts from 1936-1939, then as a court fiscale in Göta Court of Appeal from 1940. He served as a temporary assessor at Norrköping City Court in 1941, and as secretary for Bråbygdens and Finspånga district courts from 1942-1946. He was an adjunct member of the Göta Court of Appeal in 1946. He was also chairman of the Kviillinge tenant association from 1942-1946 and chairman of the tax authority in 1945.

employmentHistory.name: N. Möre and Stranda District Courts
